title: AIOT based Smart Education System: A Dual Layer Authentication and Context-Aware Tutoring Framework for Learning Environments
summary: The AIoT-Based Smart Education System integrates Artificial Intelligence and IoT to address persistent challenges in contemporary classrooms: attendance fraud, lack of personalization, student disengagement, and inefficient resource use.
